TopicTitle: Need quick help finding an IVA mod.

Articles.Content: I remember a while ago there was a mod that adds improved IVA with Raster Prop Monitors in several stocks and modded cockpits, and I kind of lost it from my mod storage. I can't remember the name, and "IVA" as a search term is too generic. Anyone knows what I am talking about?
Did you look through the links on the front page of RPM's ? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57603-0-25-RasterPropMonitor-putting-the-A-in-your-IVA-%28v0-18-3%29-8-Oct

Yeah, I did. Not one of those. It was a bunch of .cfg that replace many, many cockpits with RPM. I think it was one of the 0.25 mod, but I am not sure if it was released or was a dev version....curse my spotty memory.
Found the thing today when someone brought it up: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96148-AeroKerbin-Industries-Modified-IVAs
